spirit:component.spirit:name: cpu_axi_epc_0_0

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_CLK_PERIOD_PS
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: C S Axi Clk Period Ps

spirit:component.spirit:description: This specification defines the architecture and interface requirements for the External Peripheral Controller (AXI EPC IP Core).

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_RDY_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Maximum period of device ready signal (PRH_Rdy) to wait before device timeout

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_RDY_TOUT
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Device ready (PRH_Rdy) validity from the falling edge of read or write (PRH_Rd_n/ PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_DATA_TINV
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Data bus (PRH_Data) high impedance from rising edge of read (PRH_Rd_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_DATA_TOUT
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Data bus (PRH_Data) validity from falling edge of read signal (PRH_Rd_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_RD_CYCLE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Cycle time of read signal (PRH_Rd_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_RDN_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Minimum pulse width of read signal (PRH_Rd_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_DATA_TH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Data bus (PRH_Data) hold with respect to rising edge of write signal (PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_DATA_TSU
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Data bus (PRH_Data) setup with respect to falling edge of write signal (PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_WR_CYCLE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Cycle time of write signal (PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_WRN_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Minimum pulse width of write signal (PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_CSN_TH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Chip select (PRH_CS_n) hold with respect to rising edge of read/write (PRH_Rd_n/ PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_CSN_TSU
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Chip select (PRH_CS_n) setup with respect to falling edge of read/write (PRH_Rd_n/ PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_ADS_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Minimum pulse width of address strobe (PRH_ADS)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_ADDR_TH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Address bus (PRH_Addr) hold with respect to falling edge of address strobe (PRH_ADS) or rising edge of read/write (PRH_Rd_n/ PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_ADDR_TSU
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Address bus (PRH_Addr) setup with respect to rising edge of address strobe (PRH_ADS) or falling edge of read/write (PRH_Rd_n/ PRH_Wr_n)

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_BUS_MULTIPLEX
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Peripheral bus type

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_SYNC
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Peripheral access mode

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_DWIDTH_MATCH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Support for data width match when the peripheral device data width is less than the AXI data width

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_DWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Data bus width of peripherals

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_AWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Address bus width of peripherals

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_FIFO_OFFSET
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: External peripheral FIFO offset from peripheral base address

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_FIFO_ACCESS
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Support for access to FIFO within the external peripheral

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_HIGHADDR
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This parameter should be set by the user, no 2 HIGH address of different peripherals should be same.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH3_BASEADDR
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This parameter should be set by the user, no 2 BASE address of different peripherals should be same.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH_CLK_SUPPORT
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Select the clock to drive peripheral
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Peripheral clock support

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH_MAX_ADWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Maximum of data bus width of all peripherals and address bus with of peripherals employing address/data multiplexing

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH_MAX_DWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Maximum of data bus width of all external peripherals

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH_MAX_AWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Maximum of address bus width of all external peripherals

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_NUM_PERIPHERALS
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Number of peripherals 1 to 4

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_PRH_CLK_PERIOD_PS
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Peripheral clock period should be always less than AXI clock period but not less than 24Mhz(41000 ps).If more than one device is synchronous, then the frequency for the peripheral clock (PRH_Clk) should be chosen as the minimum of the operating frequencies of those devices

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_S_AXI_CLK_PERIOD_PS
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: AXI clock period range should be between 25Mhz(40000 ps) to 300Mhz(3333 ps)
